Cloud Infrastructure-Ready Lift and shif: Applications deployed to VMs in Azure
Cloud-Optimized Modernize: Monolithic or N-Tier apps deployed to Azure App Service, Azure Container Instance (ACI), VMs with containers, or AKS (Azure Kubernetes Service)
Cloud-Native Modernize, rearchitect, and: Containerized microservices on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) and/or serverless microservices based on Azure Functions.

Cloud Infrastructure-Ready Lift and shif: SQL or any relational database on a VM
Cloud-Optimized Modernize: Azure SQL Database Managed Instance or another managed database in the cloud.
Cloud-Native Modernize, rearchitect, and: Fined-grain databases per microservice, based on Azure SQL Database, Azure Cosmos DB, or another managed database in the cloud
